website_summaries.verdict: Owners are highly satisfied w/both functionality and price.
cons: Occasional complaints of lint on dishes

customer_reviews.title: Don't stain your slacks
customer_reviews.text: I cook while sitting in my wheelchair so I keep a kitchen towel in my lap to catch the inevitable spills. So I use a LOT of towels. It is nice to add these attractive towels. I also use the Amazon Prime Pantry shipping boxes on the floor as the storage place for my food. I didn't exactly buy these but the boxes are useful. The built in handles are good since they allow me to pull a box out so I can reach something in the back of the box.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hutcheson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: These feel terribly cheap. I figured with so many good reviews they must be good, but they just feel so cheap and thin and small. Threads are shedding all over and they’re a bit scratchy too. The only way I could imagine them holding up for a year or two is just because there are so many of them. I will be using them for nice rags, not kitchen hand towels like I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Polyester not cotton
customer_reviews.text: The kitchen towels i received were polyester, not cotton as advertised. The tag plainly read polyester ! They were non obsorbment,wouldn't pick-up water.
customer_reviews.author: Scoot

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality towels. They dry well, they wash well, and they stand up to normal use. They did shrink some, but not so much as to be bothersome. They did not warp at all when washed which is better than I can say of my expensive bath towels! I'd gladly buy more, but there are so many in the pack I don't NEED more (yet). I got rid of all my old kitchen towels and now these are the only ones I use!
customer_reviews.author: J. Becker

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews, I was a little skeptical when I received these towels. They seemed thin to me. I washed them, dried them outside (don't use dryer, saves $ n clothes),. When first tried the towel drying g dishes, I was really impressed. Perfect size. They absorbed and dried dishes great. For 12 towels, the price was right.I do hope they can last. The black towel drape on oven handle. I hate that they are made in Pakistan, the dreaded middle east. Why cant they be made here? I knew before buying so the reviews were right because they are absorbent and work. Wash before using.
customer_reviews.author: Catlady71

customer_reviews.title: Super absorbant, soft
customer_reviews.text: Gift for daughter. Didn't think I'd get a chance to use them, but when I babysat my grandbabies, cup turned over, water all over the table, dish towels saved the day. Super absorbant, soft, and just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty excited about these towels at first because a lot came in a pack at a decent price, but I’ve only had these for a couple months and they are already ripping and falling apart! They also get a funky musty smell after only a few hours of using them after drying a dish! All the photos are different towels.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Poliseno

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very thin and poorly made. The edges are not finished, just sewn around.
customer_reviews.author: La Huerita

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, bad quality, lint all over dishes, and a mess of threads
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality. Leaves fibers/lint all over dishes. I bought these before I moved into my apartment, and only opened and used them after the return date had passed, but I wish I never bought these. They feel cheap, and there are loose threads everywhere. One towel is even sewn over itself. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: chelsa

customer_reviews.title: Lots of towels, low price, but not durable
customer_reviews.text: There's a lot of towel here for a good price, but they are very thin and do not look durable. Look at how they started unraveling with just that wash - not a single use. I think these would be best for more disposable purposes -- cleanup where you will dispose of them afterwards, or at least after a few uses. Don't expect them to be great dish towels with lots of reuse.
customer_reviews.author: Linwood

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I received these dish towels and promptly washed them in cold water as the tag says. These towels give off so much lint, it's incredible. They also feel flimsy to me. I've ordered towels from Williams Sonoma now. I won't be able using these.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy SumnerTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great towels!!
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I was looking for. They right size. The material is nice and the price is even better.
customer_reviews.author: Bros

customer_reviews.title: Fibers Everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: These things are awful to clean with. They leave black and white fibers on everything! I wish I didn't cheap out on Kitchen Towels!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen K.

customer_reviews.title: BUY THEM, YOU'LL LIKE YOUR DECISION!!
customer_reviews.text: The towels are mostly absorbable, not great but good. The issue I have is that several of the pack of 12 are starting to fray on the edges. I've had them about 2 months if that. Some are still in great shape. They are thick and great to use, especially folded over. Personally, I prefer a thicker towel, but that's me. I always reach for the towel before my bamboo reusable paper towels. They are fantastic!!! I would buy these again, but in a different color scheme. I got the black/white stripe and solid black. My ceramic stove top is black, I always lose my towel, it blends in to well!! 👐
customer_reviews.author: Mitch E.

customer_reviews.title: Utility towel
customer_reviews.text: Basic kitchen towels, better for daily use than for show. Absorbent despite their light weight and a decent woven terry check texture, but as others experienced the solid color towels shrank noticeably more after laundering and the quality of sewing at the edges varies greatly from item to item. For the price, not a bad value.
customer_reviews.author: Six Blue Monkeys

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: While I do wish that they were sold in packs of 2-3 or even 6, having 12 will make it easier if we do have a catastrophic failure of a major wet appliance! All joking aside, so far we're pretty impressed with them - they washed very well with no bleeding of the black (I was worried about that) and didn't lose their size or shape with the washing, either. I was worried that both would happen - you know, buyer beware and all of that. But no - these have so far performed very well and were a great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: SassyPete

customer_reviews.title: Poor product quality!
customer_reviews.text: Quite disappointed with these towels. Washed them before first use as directed. Upon using two for only one day, the seams are already coming undone and have had to clip the loose threads on the edges. Not a good sign for future use😔 They are good looking and very absorbable, so for functionality I’m pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Rosato

customer_reviews.title: Thin
customer_reviews.text: They are not fluffy and feel thin. I would never give them as a gift. If it was not inconvenient at this time (corona virus), I would return them
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Good value - good towel!
customer_reviews.text: These towels are what I've been looking for. They are absorbent and medium weight = not sleazy. Size is perfect for my kitchen hook or oven door handle. Kitchen towels seem to stay around for awhile until you realize suddenly they no longer look too hot! These are replacing all my old towels and I'm happy to have found them in a suitable quantity and for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: coastie

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Absorbent
customer_reviews.text: Because all of our Kitchen Towels were on their last legs, I needed new kitchen towels. I purchased these towels based on other people's reviews because I find people who use the product give the best reviews. I am very glad that I bought this product as we have put the towels to use right away. They are very absorbent and durable. several have already been through the wash cycle as we have had to cleanup some messy spills by my 2 year-old grandson. I would definitely recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen Towels!
customer_reviews.text: These are the run of the mill towel that does it’s job. Is it a shamwow no, but it still wipes up spills, washes dishes, and drys my hands. I have one hanging off my stove and one off my fridge and one off a cabinet handle at all times. They are great and for the price if you dog makes a chew toy out of it end the end it’s not the end of the world. They work and do it quite well. Enough I bought a second set. Only because the white ones started to get a little discoloration after a couple YEARS of use.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Nice kitchen towels of high quality materials
customer_reviews.text: These kitchen towels are made of quality materials and are thick enough seem like they came from an expensive department store. I've ordered these in order to be able to cut down on my paper towel consumption. I highly recommend these towels and I am sure they will pay for themselves and then some as I will be able to use much fewer paper towels while always keeping a clean kitchen towel available for use. I would purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: AKP

customer_reviews.title: Well made kitchen towels
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the black and white/black set of towels to be used in my kitchen. I washed them on a cool water/gentle cycle prior to first use. I am pleased so far with my purchase because the color goes well with my granite countertops, and the towels did not immediately fade when I washed them. I do wish they were a little more absorbent but they are satisfactory for their intended use. I do recommend washing them on a gentle/cold water cycle when possible to preserve the colors. All in all I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I'm updating my review. I bought these in October 2018 and am here to buy another pack. I bought these back then after seeing them in someone's kitchen. I still have most of the towels and they've held up great after being washed in hot or warm water all these months. They still absorb and haven't torn. I'm buying another pack because I've ruined a few by using them for emergencies like spilling coffee or wine (hard to get stains out if you don't wash them right away) and sadly had a few blow away when drying outside.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy Skye

customer_reviews.title: Very thin, won't absorb anything.
customer_reviews.text: I really hate getting multiple emails to leave a review and I don't like leaving negative ones since it is often personal preference. But if you insist on emailing me over and over to leave a review I will. These are very thin, don't absorb much. Make sure if you use them you have 2-3-4 on the counter because that is what you will need.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. B

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction, low-quality fabric
customer_reviews.text: These towels are poorly constructed. The material is barely absorbent of water, making them little more than rags (than quality kitchen towels).
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Morris

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, don’t expect much
customer_reviews.text: These towels are super cheap so I guess I shouldn’t expect much but they were smaller than your average dish towel and you can feel that they are not as thick as other kitchen towels I’ve had in the past. Probably would not order again. If you just need a bunch of towels and downy care about quality, then go for these.
customer_reviews.author: JJ King

customer_reviews.title: Grab towels for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: These towels are not very decorative but they get the job done. I was originally gifted for a wedding gift and after having 3 kids we could not have enough of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good affordable kitchen towels
customer_reviews.text: They are absorbent, but on the thinner side. Although you get so many of them (12 pack) that you can just grab another towel. I love these. I got the blue because they are bright and I’ll know if someone doesn’t put the towels away right. Overall great quality product for the price. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LeesaRay

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.text: Same comment I had about some kitchen wash cloths: I've found far too many kitchen towels that aren't absorbent at all - they just push the liquid around, making more of a mess. These don't have that problem - the do the job and look good, too. I'm very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Adams

customer_reviews.title: Really nice durable towels.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 set of these dish towels totaling 36 altogether. I am using the 18 black dish towels to cut down on the number of paper towels that I use daily (I'm trying to be more environmentally respectful) and I use the 18 white with black strip dish towels for when I have guests visiting. I've washed the black towels about 6 times in the last two week and they hold up very well. They are still very absorbent and still a very attractive deep black color. I'm very happy with this purchase and my new earth-friendly efforts.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Leone

customer_reviews.title: not happy with the quality, thickness. ect.
customer_reviews.text: I just got both package orders CHARGE ME These are great will buy more.thanks Premium Kitchen Towels (16”x 28”, 6 Pack) – Large Cotton Kitchen Hand Towels – Check Design – 380 GSM Highly Absorbent Tea Towels Set with Hanging Loop – Grey
customer_reviews.author: phil

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen towels
customer_reviews.text: They’re kitchen towels. Unless they came dirty, moldy or otherwise unserviceable, then they’re great, lol. As advertised!!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Leaves fibers behind
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace older kitchen towels. They work just fine but do leave a lot of fibers behind which is a bummer. I hope they will get better as they are washed a little. I have used these for a while now and the towels do not get any better after washing several times. I’m finding fibers everywhere so I will be demoting these to shop/garage towels and finding something better.
customer_reviews.author: KKL—L&L’s Little Shop of Goodies- Living Life RV Rentals

customer_reviews.title: Meh product for price
customer_reviews.text: Update: after using the towels for 6+ months, they’re not very good anymore. They don’t absorb things well and take forever to dry. I would not recommend or purchase again Great value for the price. One ripped soon after we started using it but considering there were 12 in the pack, it isn’t the end of the world. They’re absorbent for the kitchen and dry pretty well (not necessarily fast, but they do dry out eventually).
customer_reviews.author: Muckle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect thickness, perfect texture
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after reading many glowing reviews and by golly here's another one. Perfect thickness, perfect texture, I can dry my hands more than once without them getting too wet to use. I received them just in time for the big Thanksgiving feast preparation. Three of us in the kitchen and only 4 towels used and two of those were for drying the dishes. Hooray! I'll be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: amy ro

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I will definitely buy more! I use these for my kitchen. I am extremely happy with this purchase. I only buy household goods items in bulk so this purchase was a no brainer for me! Definitely worth the buy if you don't like running to the store constantly. So convenient and straight to your door!
customer_reviews.author: Brianah Weston

customer_reviews.title: A great value for a good price
customer_reviews.text: A great value for a good price! These towels looks great, work well as kitchen towels and cleaning up help, but also come clean when washed. These have the potential to become the kitchen towels the young adult will keep and use for years, while looking stylish and homey at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Webb

customer_reviews.title: I have thing about towels, and these are good towels
customer_reviews.text: One of the many secrets in Kitchen Confidential, by Anthony Bourdain is that chefs love their towels. When I heard this it codified my town fetish and I bought two more sets so I could always have a small stash of clean towels before every meal.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Made well
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how nice these dish towels are,they were just what I was looking for. They are a perfect size,they are made well. I washed these and there was slight shrinkage but nothing too bad. They are sewn well and did not unravel in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hemming
customer_reviews.text: The seams started coming out on a few different towels after just one wash. I bought these towels because they were cute and I needed kitchen towels. But unfortunately I don't think they're going to last very long at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Meh, not that good
customer_reviews.text: Product definately lacks quality. Already fraying at the ends, I will be returning the item.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent, wash well
customer_reviews.text: I like being able to trade out dish towels, so the multi pack was a great value.
customer_reviews.author: eal

customer_reviews.title: Love these hand towels!
customer_reviews.text: I love these hand towels. They are just what I wanted. Minimalist colors, lightweight, and plenty absorbant for switching out a new one every day. I have had then a few months now and they are still making just as happy in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Towels totally frayed and unraveled at the seams after the first wash.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie s

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I wanted to cut down on paper towel use but also get so grossed out by reusing kitchen towels. There are so many of these that I can just use a one or two for one or two days and put it in a basket and wash at the end of the week. They absorb water very well if you have a dishwasher that doesn’t completely dry dishes. There have been a few threads unraveling but not much. Worth the prices to me.
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: They seem a bit on the thin side, reminding me of terrycloth; however they've got great absorption and seem to be lasting just fine through a couple of wash cycles. I've seen other reviews complaining about lint, but I've not had that problem. Size is just right for a kitchen towel and I love that you get 12 of them. Only con would be price as $20 for 12 kitchen towels seems a bit much. If they sold them for 10 bucks I'm sure they'd still be making massive profit.
customer_reviews.author: John W

customer_reviews.title: Good All-Purpose Towel for Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these towels for our kitchen as an all-purpose towel for wiping down counter tops and drying hands. I was pleasantly surprised that these towels are not thin and flimsy but decently thick and durable. These towels will hold up longer that I expected. I like the black ones b/c they don't show the dirt that quickly accumulates when using around the kitchen. These towels are not high quality, but they are definitely not low quality either. Perfect dish or kitchen towels.
customer_reviews.author: MrNate

customer_reviews.title: great kitchen or bar towels
customer_reviews.text: I don't like to spend a lot on kitchen towels, as they are basically used for wiping up messes and are constantly getting washed. These are perfect for that reason. They have held up really well in the wash (I have washed them multiple times with no fraying on any of them) and they are absorbent. What more do you need?
customer_reviews.author: amaryllis30

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Towels - They are what they are!
customer_reviews.text: These are not some crazy Egyptian cotton blend or anything fancy. These are good looking, nice feeling basic day to day kitchen hand towels. They work, look great and do the job for the most part! Will buy exactly the same again when these get too old.
customer_reviews.author: Sean O'Dea

customer_reviews.title: IDEAL TOWEL
customer_reviews.text: Many people recommend washing first to increase the absorbance. You do not need to with these towels. I began using them right out of the box and they work better than the ancient bathroom hand towels I'd been using. Yeah, I used those old towels not for class but because they really absorbed. These "Utopia" towels are just as good...maybe better because they even look great in my new kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: MachoBunny

customer_reviews.title: Not the worst ~~ Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Towels are thinner than I like and lost some thickness after washing and drying. It filled my dryer with lint on the first wash. They work and do the job I purchased them for. I would buy again if the price was still around $1each.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Missy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice dish towels.
customer_reviews.text: These are good looking dish towels. The best thing about them is they are absorbent. Many dish towels I have purchased may look nice but they don't dry the dishes all that well. These do. Don't know about their durability yet because have only had them less than a week. Really like them, however, and would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen towel set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great towel set for the kitchen. No need to spend money on towel you are going to destroy anyways. The black towels are good for staining mess cleanups like tomato sauces. They have been through the wash a few times now and hold up well to heavy use. All around good towels to use and abuse in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn FieldingTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: I love these towels but the black loses its color in the wash
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with my purchase they work great and great size too but the black washes out in the wash. so go for a color that is not so noticeable when you wash it
customer_reviews.author: April8181

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Towels You Can Depend On!
customer_reviews.text: These kitchen towels do a nice job of absorbing water and anything else you can throw at them. I washed them and they came out very nice. They look great in my kitchen. I would highly recommend purchasing these towels.
customer_reviews.author: BIG AL CHICAGO

customer_reviews.title: Not very good
customer_reviews.text: I ordered them because it was labeled with 4+ starts but I don't see how if this is the poor quality of what is given to the buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Useful, durable, absorbent towrls
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th time I've purchased these towels, as I own guest houses, and I also use them in my own house. They are large, durable, absorb well and don't stain easily.
customer_reviews.author: Marian B. Laroche

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: So much of the material on towel everywhere! Didn’t expect this at all. Black little fragments over entire counter. My spilled water didn’t absorb but pushed it away.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Very good towels; just wish they were larger
customer_reviews.text: The feel and durability is very good. We mostly use them for drying dishes and pans. They perform very well. I just wish they were larger. Five stars if 25-33% larger in size.
customer_reviews.author: Reasonable Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Loved the material! They’re thick enough to do any job in the kitchen. I also liked the color scheme. My kitchen has white cabinets with brushed stainless handles and the counter tops are black granite so the look is cohesive. The black towels are great when you have young children and can’t be bothered to wash stains off every now and then.
customer_reviews.author: May1 Balbarin

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, nice material and best of all absorbant and dry quickly
customer_reviews.text: These look great but the thing that makes them outstanding is that they are very absorbent and also dry quickly. When you are active in the kitchen and washing your hands frequently you do not end up with a hand towel too wet to serve its purpose. Highly recommended for their functionality matched with good looks.
customer_reviews.author: M on Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Good generic dishtowels
customer_reviews.text: Good dish towels for the price. Nothing super special about them. Warning if you wash them the all black towels with the white and black towels the color will bleed and you will get a grey/light blue color in the white areas of the towels.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Lower quality than previous towels purchased from Walmart.
customer_reviews.text: These towels are a bit thin and feel cheap. One towel had a two inch section that was completely missing the absorbent filler weave, as shown in photo. I guess I'll use them until they fall apart, which looks to be sooner rather than later.
customer_reviews.author: R. Zadow

customer_reviews.title: Go to TJMaxx
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality. They don’t absorb as much as I would have expected for the price. Next time I will stick to the TJMaxx towels that are half the price.
customer_reviews.author: kristian Trapl

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Just became single again after 13 years and I let my keep everything from the kitchen as I don't cook so I had to buy everything and find deal because it was costing me a lot of money. These were a great price for a great quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for all kitchen purposes.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these almost 4 years ago and they are still going strong. They are absorbent and dry all kinds of surfaces including dishes, pans, sinks and counters very effectively. I am about to buy another set to add to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen towels
customer_reviews.text: I have used these towels everyday for about a month and washed them several times. They are quite absorbent and they retain their good looks.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned these dish towels for months. 5 stars! I don't think that they are towels that you would want to gift wrap as a wedding gift (unless the family is dysfunctional ... haha. ) , but for everyday personal use....excellent.
customer_reviews.author: BrookhavenGuy

customer_reviews.title: Nice for price
customer_reviews.text: Good purchase overall, after initial washing spent several minutes cutting loose threads from towels. Looks nice in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Wise

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dirty and don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Arrived dirty and look like they have been stored in a filthy environment. The white towels are still dingy after washing so they look cheap and worn out. Bummed and should have returned. Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These towels have been great for our kitchen. They are absorbent and have held up wonderfully so far. Because you get so many for the price, we use each one for a day or two and get the next one out. I am sure towels costing much, much more would be better, but that is to be expected. We are not talking about expensive towels here. If you just need basic kitchen towels and don't want to spend a bunch, these are perfect. Overall, I have zero complaints and would gladly purchase them again!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Super absorbant
customer_reviews.text: These are nice kitchen towels. They are a generous size and absorbant. I washed them in cold water with white vinegar before I used them. No fading, unraveling or pilling. I haven't bought kitchen towels in years and I am very pleased with these towels.
customer_reviews.author: amanda1

customer_reviews.title: The perfect kitchen towel
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Pretty enough to leave on your counter by your sink area without looking like just a kitchen rag. Thick and absorbent!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Ledet

customer_reviews.title: Nice kitchen towels for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with these towels,. Nice looking, seems well made, absorbent and not to thick and bulky. I washed them before using and they washed up nice.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase and delivery process.
customer_reviews.text: Purchase process great and delivery as promised. I cannot rate product as I had towels sent/donated to local animal shelter for use. I did hear from the volunteer staff that the towels were fine and would go into immediate use. I assume they will work fine for the purpose intended. The seller was certainly dependable.
customer_reviews.author: marvelous

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: These towels were highly rated for quality and I’m not sure why? They are in general smaller than all of my other kitchen towels and are much thinner. After laundering, the black color ones in the set picked up lots of lint and looked so bad I put them out in the garage to use next to our utility sink.
customer_reviews.author: redirtgrl

customer_reviews.title: these are the old fashioned kitchen towels you have been looking for
customer_reviews.text: the challenge with kitchen towels is to find something absorbent enough that it doesn't turn into a sopping rag the minute it's used a couple of times...and not so absorbent that it's like a bath towel that takes forever to dry. These are the old fashioned kitchen towels you have been looking for. They have rows of terri cloth looping that absorbs moisture, in between rows of tight weaving the helps the towel hold its shape. the whole towel dries very quickly. So perhaps the "utopia" in the brand name is a descriptor rather than the brand...who knows?
customer_reviews.author: mch

customer_reviews.title: Towels.  Just towels.  We got what we wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon sells a lot of dishtowels made out of fancy fabric, and it turns out they do things like scorch or melt if you put something hot on them, or they shed as much water as they soak up, or they're some weird little size. These Utopia towels are just plain old-fashioned dishtowels. They're cotton so they feel like the dishtowels your mother used. They soak up water. They dry things off fast. They actually look good. And they're a good size. We're glad we got them, and we're retiring the high-tech towels that have problems. Compared to these Utopia towels, the high-tech stuff is just nowhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sad buy
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other reviews mine haven't fallen apart of frayed but even after 6 months they still shed and leave fibers on your hands. I thought it would've stopped after a few washes and kept giving it time but should've returned them right away. They also aren't thick enough to absorb much liquid. Every time I "dry" my hands on the kitchen I feel like I'm rubbing my hands on a moist bacteria infested towel because it hasn't dried after hours since last use. It's almost like I can only use them once and throw them in the dirty basket. Probably my second most disappointing buy yet I should've done more research
customer_reviews.author: Halsey

customer_reviews.title: Cheap fabric and construction
customer_reviews.text: Just got product, washed them on gentle and they already started falling apart and threading. The white ones are fine but the black ones look and feel like an old rough sweater thats pilling.
customer_reviews.author: K Jaws

customer_reviews.title: Objects in your mirror. ....
customer_reviews.text: Very suspicious when product arrived Towels felt inferior, was very frustrated like I had been hoodwinked again with praising reviews, but I remembered one of those reviews mentioned washing the towels before using, great advice. Towels ,showed there absorbability after a wash and dry.
customer_reviews.author: TONY  2 KIND

customer_reviews.title: Nice kitchen towels
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say on durability yet. I just got them. But are absorbing and quite pretty. I would recommend. And the size is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Faye Dawson

customer_reviews.title: I don’t like these kitchen towels they leave lint all over my ...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like these kitchen towels they leave lint all over my dishes after laundering the dish towels many times
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Price doesn’t mean everything
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion these are way too thin. The price was fantastic and I should’ve use my better judgment when somethings too good to be true don’t do it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob H

customer_reviews.title: Good Kitchen Towel for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Having never purchased dish towels before I was not sure what to expect for the price. However, I am very pleased with this purchase. These towels are soft and absorbent and seem well made. Good for drying dishes or hands and wiping counters. They are not super thick, but I did not want a super thick towel so for my taste they are just fine. They have been washed a few times and are holding up well. I suspect they will last a long time. They look nice too.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. JacquesTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy; excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for their purpose. Look nice, absorb well, tuck 'em in your apron and head for the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: A J Saveriano

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: These towels are perfect for use in my kitchen. They are a nice size and very thick. I recommended to all!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again !!!!
customer_reviews.text: There nice as described and you get alot for a little , I would recommend and would gift . They are thin yet I like thin .
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: A great hand towel.
customer_reviews.text: If you are in the market for a great hand towel that's thick enough for grabbing a hot pot and will handle all your drying needs, then these are the ones for you. I have ordered these two times and both times I couldn't have been happier. One of the things I picked in culinary school is how important hand towel is to everyone and I have brought this loving home with me I have to have plenty in my home kitchen. I hate slick weak towels. These are the best I have purchased at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: calvin long

customer_reviews.title: These are some pretty good kitchen towels
customer_reviews.text: These are some pretty good kitchen towels. They arrived quickly. I have used them and washed them twice. I have used all sorts of towels for all sorts of cleaning and these so far are at the top of my list for quality at their price. I will try and remember to post and update in several months to see how they perform over time. So far they absorb more than competitor's towl at the same price point. I also think these are thicker than some others at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin G. Clemmer

customer_reviews.title: This pack is perfect for anyone’s kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: I washed them all several times and they all hold up. Material is nice. I really get a good use out of them. I like the color option. Perfect for keeping the kitchen clean. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: These towels are great. We keep them in the kitchen and bathroom
customer_reviews.text: These towels are great. We keep them in the kitchen and bathroom, and they seem to soak up a good amount of water. I have washed them at least 3x, and have had no issues with them shrinking or ripping apart. The only issue I had with them is when I first washed them, the black towels seemed to tinge the white towels slightly - so you may want to wash them separately from everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Cici L

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good.
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good. They coordinate well with the buffalo check pattern I have in my kitchen. They aren't super absorbent though and they aren't very soft. They seem fairly durable.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Williams

customer_reviews.title: good absorbent towels
customer_reviews.text: What I really liked about these towels was there a absorbent nature. One of the main reasons to use a towel it's so that it will absorb moisture from your hands or a countertop or whatever you need it for. These work great.
customer_reviews.author: Tj

customer_reviews.title: Love these towels.
customer_reviews.text: Love these towels. They are soft and absorbent. Perfect for wiping dishes or hands in the kitchen. When I first opened them, I thought they seemed a little thin, but I'm finding they really are the perfect thickness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One use towels
customer_reviews.text: They were very poorly made, moderate absorption, stitching was coming apart after the first wash.
customer_reviews.author: todd loveday

customer_reviews.title: Good kitchen towels
customer_reviews.text: Nice kitchen towels. Soft, absorbent, good size and great look for kitchen use.
customer_reviews.author: MomNana

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: These are good little kitchen towels nothing fancy but they are sturdy and attractive
customer_reviews.author: Sally Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value... you get what you pay for. The towels are a little on the thin side, but they were a great price and mine get stained easily so I don’t like to buy expensive towels. I washed them before use and they came out great and held their shape. I would probably purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Geri

product_meta.title: Utopia Towels Kitchen Towels, 15 x 25 Inches, 100% Ring Spun Cotton Super Soft and Absorbent Black Dish Towels, Tea Towels and Bar Towels, (Pack of 12)
feature_bullets: Set includes 12 cotton dish towels with six black and six white dobby weave style kitchen towels measuring 15 by 25 inches
Woven with 100% ring spun cotton making these towels durable and strong for all household chores
Made from natural materials and free from harmful chemicals or synthetic materials, safe for you & your family
Do not use bleach, fabric softeners, and iron as it may damage its quality; always wash the towels separately to minimize lint
Machine wash the towels in warm water using mild detergent and tumble dry on low; recommended to dry immediately to minimize mildew
